data.name: Kao the Kangaroo
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

ðŸ¥Š THE GAME ðŸ¥Š


Kao The Kangaroo is a 3D platformer from veterans of the genre Tate Multimedia, featuring a plucky, cheeky but a cutie, Kao The Kangaroo (Hey, just like in the title!) on a quest to uncover the truth around the disappearance of his father.

ðŸ¥Š THE JOURNEY ðŸ¥Š


During his journey, Kao will explore a wide variety of beautifully detailed environments, each harboring secrets to uncover. At every turn, Kao faces new challenges. Heâ€™ll have to use all his skills while learning some new ones...not all of them being natural to the world he lives in! As they say, itâ€™s the journey that makes us, not the destination.

ðŸ¥Š THE CONTENT ðŸ¥Š


Being inspired by the heyday of 3D platformers, as well as building on Kaoâ€™s 21-year legacy, Kao The Kangaroo is packed with plenty of jumping, thumping, puzzle-solving, and collecting. A whole new amazing adventure with all the charm youâ€™d expect from not just the genre, but Kao himself!

ðŸ¥Š THE CAST ðŸ¥Š


Kaoâ€™s beautiful and bright world is filled with a host of colorful characters just waiting for you to meet them... in some cases (try to) defeat them! From wise mentors and inquisitive inventors to big old bullies, the cast of Kao The Kangaroo is as memorable as it is expansive!

ðŸ¥Š THE FIGHT ðŸ¥Š


While on his journey Kao will have to overcome many foes. Quick and nimble strikers, slow and lumbering brutes, and everything in between. Kao will have to use all the lessons heâ€™s learned to defeat those who stand before himâ€¦

ðŸ¥Š THE GLOVES ðŸ¥Š


The mysterious, mesmerizing, long-buried, gloves Kao has on his paws are oozing with power yet to be fully unleashed. Theyâ€™ll be a key tool in Kaoâ€™s journey, helping to ward off foes and traverse the world. Will the secrets of their power ever be fully understood? Kao looks to find out.

ðŸ¥Š THE WORLD ðŸ¥Š


Explore a diverse range of Unique and beautiful interactive worlds filled with fresh challenges, enemies, puzzles, and secrets! Jump, climb, dive and ride your way through highly detailed environments as Kao progresses on his journey!

ðŸ¥Š THE MISTERY ðŸ¥Š


Lurking behind Kaoâ€™s plane of existence lays a whole other world filled with mystery, uncontrollable power, and chaos...the Eternal World. A link between the two worlds exists, melding together. Its secrets are in Kaoâ€™s hands, giving him new powers...but at what cost?

ðŸ¥Š KAO IS BACK ðŸ¥Š

data.short_description: Inspired by the golden age of 3D Platformers, Kao The Kangaroo returns in a whole new adventure! Embark on an epic journey, master magical gloves, explore lush environments and take Kao through his most grand tale yet!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
